metadata.description: Name of the VM
Size of the VM
Name of the availability set if defined

Array of datadisks to add to VM at deployment (ie, [[512,Premium_LRS],[2048,Standard_LRS]] would add 2 datadisks, 1 at 512GB and Premium_LRS storage type, and 1 at 2TB and Standard_LRS storage type. )
Location of the resources
Tag for automatic shutdown and deallocation of VM
Tag for automatic restart of VM
URI to custom image if any
Size of the OS Disk (in GB)
Storage type for VM (ie. Standard_LRS, Premium_LRS, etc.)
Name of the existing VNET
Name of the existing VNET resource group
Name of the subnet in the virtual network you want to use
Suffix for the NIC (ie. 001, 0001)
Name of the existing Boot Diag Storage Account to use during deployment
Version of the VM Diagnostics extension (ie. 1.5 for Windows or 2.3 for Linux)
Object with list of tags to add onto the NIC and VM
OMS workspace ID
OMS workspace name
OMS workspace key
SAS Token for accessing private source control
Url of the custom script to be run.
Name of the custom script to be run.
Command to run with custom script
OS Publisher of Marketplace image.
Offer of Marketplace image.
SKU to use for Marketplace image
Version to use for Marketplace image
